articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT nader dabit (🧱, 🚀) | sha.eth | nader.sol
I've been building an app using @ArweaveTeam as the storage layer, but instead of storing files I'm storing strings of text (think tweets)
Instead of storing directly to Arweave I'm using @BundlrNetwork & from what I can tell is around 20X🤯 cheaper for up to 280 bytes
1/n 🧵

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Owl.pcc.eth
NFT holders have fallen for too many scams.
Millions of $ taken away. 💸
What if there was a way to prevent this?
Introducing the Guardian Contract, enabled by the LockRegistry standard.
Even if you get your seed leaked, fear not, NFTs are safu.
A 🧵👇 https://medium.com/@owl_of_moistness/95f3fff7f1cc
